title: Omaze donation email
body:
Hi all, I was wondering if someone could help me.

I donated some money a few days ago now when the event started and i've not received anything? No emails to confirm they got my money, no emails for the items I should have received, nothing. Could someone maybe tell me how long it took them to receive an email?

thanks in advance! :D

replies.body: Depends on what tier you selected, I think.  It took me about 3 days to receive a separate email for the Impact Challenge code.  The subject of the email should be something along the lines of _Redeem your League of Legends icon!_   Hope that helps!  I don't now a lot about it, but I'm happy to try and help!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=fpe4g959,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-14T21:41:43.173+0000)
>
> Depends on what tier you selected, I think.  It took me about 3 days to receive a separate email for the Impact Challenge code.  The subject of the email should be something along the lines of _Redeem your League of Legends icon!_   Hope that helps!  I don't now a lot about it, but I'm happy to try and help!

Alright! Thanks a lot, I'll keep my eyes open then and hope I get the icon soon! :D Have a nice day and thanks for the help!

If you made a contribution through Omaze, you should have received an "Order Confirmation" email.  Double check your spam folder just in case it may have been filtered out somehow!  If you created an account, you should also be able to go to your [Omaze account page](https://www.omaze.com/profile#/order/history) to verify that you have an Order # for your donation.  It will be under the History section.  Hope that helps!

If you don't have a history, nothing in spam email, or no account setup, then hit up [Omaze's support center ](https://support.omaze.com/hc/en-us)to see if they are able to find your transaction.

Let me know what you find!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=fpe4g959,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-14T21:21:18.465+0000)
>
> If you made a contribution through Omaze, you should have received an "Order Confirmation" email.  Double check your spam folder just in case it may have been filtered out somehow!  If you created an account, you should also be able to go to your [Omaze account page](https://www.omaze.com/profile#/order/history) to verify that you have an Order # for your donation.  It will be under the History section.  Hope that helps!
> 
> If you don't have a history, nothing in spam email, or no account setup, then hit up [Omaze's support center ](https://support.omaze.com/hc/en-us)to see if they are able to find your transaction.
> 
> Let me know what you find!

Hi, thanks for the reply! I checked my junk mail and nothings there unfortunately. However i do have an order number there and it says my payment was successful! :D So i know they got my money, which is a relief! Now do I just wait 4-16 weeks to receive my items? Sorry, I realise you might not know and I appreciate the help either way!
